SELECT count(*) FROM LECQNA WHERE LEC_ID=#{lecId} and LEC_SEMS=(SELECT SEMS_NO FROM SEMSDATA
WHERE SYSDATE >= SEMS_SDATE AND SYSDATE <= SEMS_EDATE)

SELECT E.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, D.* FROM( SELECT A.LECBO_NO ,A.LEC_SEMS ,A.LEC_ID ,A.PRO_NO ,A.LECBO_INFO ,A.LECBO_TITLE ,A.LECBO_HIT ,TO_CHAR(A.LECBO_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LECBO_DATE ,A.LECBO_PASS ,A.STU_NO ,A.LECBO_LIKE
,(SELECT B.USER_NAME FROM USERS B WHERE B.USER_NO=A.PRO_NO) AS PRO_NAME
,(SELECT C.USER_NAME FROM USERS C WHERE C.USER_NO=A.STU_NO) AS STU_NAME
FROM LECQNA A WHERE LEC_ID=#{lecId} AND LEC_SEMS=(SELECT SEMS_NO FROM SEMSDATA
WHERE SYSDATE >= SEMS_SDATE AND SYSDATE <= SEMS_EDATE)
ORDER BY lecbo_no DESC )D )E
WHERE RNUM >=#{startRow} AND RNUM <=#{endRow}

SELECT A.LECBO_NO as bono ,A.LEC_SEMS ,A.LEC_ID ,A.PRO_NO ,A.LECBO_INFO ,A.LECBO_TITLE ,A.LECBO_CONTENT ,A.LECBO_HIT ,A.LECBO_DATE ,A.LECBO_PASS ,A.STU_NO ,A.LECBO_LIKE ,E.attch_no ,E.attch_fname ,E.attch_sname ,E.attch_mime ,E.attch_size ,E.attch_fsize ,E.attch_dhit ,(SELECT B.USER_NAME FROM USERS B WHERE B.USER_NO=A.PRO_NO) AS PRO_NAME ,(SELECT C.USER_NAME FROM USERS C WHERE C.USER_NO=A.STU_NO) AS STU_NAME FROM LECQNA A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTCH E ON (A.LECBO_NO = E.LECQNA_NO) WHERE A.LECBO_NO=#{lecboNo}
SELECT A.* FROM LECQNA A LEFT OUTER JOIN LECREPLY B ON (A.LECBO_NO=B.LECBO_NO)AND B.STU_NO IS NULL WHERE A.PRO_NO IS NULL AND A.LEC_ID = #{lecId} AND B.PRO_NO IS NULL ORDER BY A.LECBO_DATE DESC
